00061 KStartupLogo::KStartupLogo()
00062     : QWidget(0, "startuplogo", WStyle_Customize | WStyle_NoBorder) {
00063 
00064   QPixmap pm;   
00065     if ( !pm.load(locate("BT_pic","startuplogo.png")) )
00066     qWarning("Can't load startuplogo! Check your installation.");
00067 
00068   setBackgroundPixmap(pm);
00069 
00070   //Please not change the margin
00071   textLabel = new QLabel(this);
00072   textLabel->setGeometry(0,pm.height(),pm.width(),textLabel->sizeHint().height());
00073   textLabel->setBackgroundColor( Qt::black );
00074 
00075     QPalette p = palette();
00076   p.setColor( QPalette::Inactive, QColorGroup::Text, Qt::white );
00077   p.setColor( QPalette::Inactive, QColorGroup::Foreground, Qt::white );
00078   p.setColor( QPalette::Normal, QColorGroup::Text, Qt::white );
00079   p.setColor( QPalette::Normal, QColorGroup::Foreground, Qt::white );
00080   setPalette( p );
00081 
00082   setGeometry (
00083     (KApplication::desktop()->width()-pm.width())/2,
00084         (KApplication::desktop()->height()-pm.height()-textLabel->height())/2,
00085     pm.width(),
00086     pm.height()+textLabel->height());
00087 }

00089 void KStartupLogo::setText(const QString text){
00090     //Please not make the text bold & let the first character be blank
00091   textLabel->setText( QString::fromLatin1(" %1").arg(text) );
00092   KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents();
